Consumable (Substance)

This colorless spirit, favored by Mandalorians, burns the mouth and throat when consumed. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next 10 minutes, the creature experiences a high that allows them to roll an additional [[/r d8]] when making an ability check or saving throw using Constitution, and at the start of each of the creature's turns it gains [[/r 2d8]] temporary hit points. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or experience a low that lasts 4 hours, during which they must roll a [[/r d8]] and subtract the result when making an ability check or saving throw using Constitution, and for the duration their current and maximum hit points are reduced by [[/r 2d8]]. If this would reduce your maximum hit points below 1, it instead becomes 1. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw to resist addiction.
